full_summary:
=====================================

**FW012-240412 Electrofishing Vessel**
=====================================

**Reference Number:** WS4283415575-Doc4285366928
**Amendment 2** | **Solicitation Number:** WS4283415575

**Publication Date:** November 20, 2023 | **Tender Closing Date:** December 13, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking proposals for the procurement of an electrofishing vessel for the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO). This tender announcement constitutes Amendment 2 and supersedes all previous announcements regarding the procurement.

**Contract Details:**
-------------------

*   **Contract Start Date:** November 22, 2023
*   **Contract End Date:** October 31, 2024
*   **Region of Delivery:** Ontario (excluding National Capital Region)
*   **Contract Category:** Goods and Services (GD)

**Procurement Method:**
--------------------

A Request for Proposal (RFP) has been issued, inviting qualified contractors to submit their proposals. The procurement method is competitive and open to all eligible bidders.

**Evaluation Criteria:**
-------------------

Proposals will be evaluated based on a combination of technical merit and price. The highest combined rating will determine the successful contractor.

**Trade Agreements:**
------------------

This tender announcement may be subject to various trade agreements, including:

*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

**Interested Bidders:**
-------------------

Eligible bidders can obtain the tender documents and instructions on the Ariba Discovery website. Please note that all supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by December 13, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST. Any bid submissions after this time will be considered non-responsive.

For any further inquiries, please contact:

*   **Stanley Chui (SPAC/PSPC)**
    *   Email: stanley.chui@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
    *   Phone: N/A
    *   Fax
